name: INTERCULTURAL DIALOGUE PLATFORM
goal:
The purpose of the association is to:

• promote mutual comprehension, harmonious interaction and constructive engagement among people and groups of various cultural backgrounds;

• acknowledge the plural characteristics of contemporary society and foster the diversity of cultural expressions within a democratic framework in which respect for human dignity, human rights and social justice is indispensable;

• promote cultural diversity and mutual respect among all walks of society to safeguard peaceful coexistence and a secure social cohesion;

• acknowledge the necessity for the peaceful resolution of conflicts and rejects all kinds of interpretations that lead or encourage extremism and violence;

• pursue activities in awareness-raising and capacity building to foster commitment to human rights and fundamental freedoms as well as to combat against expressions of any kind of racism, xenophobia, anti-Semitism and Islamophobia;

• improve the ability of those living in Europe, particularly the young people, to deal with the plural, diverse and complex cultural and social environment and encourages them to be active citizens who respect for cultural diversity and share common universal values;

• undertake, contribute, sponsor and encourage academic research, work and publication, which address a social, political, cultural or educational problem, challenge or phenomenon faced by the contemporary society, whose findings are of direct relevance and value for academic institutions, policy-making bodies, governmental and non-governmental organizations;

• carry out policy research and stimulate thinking and exchange of opinions on opportunities and challenges for social cohesion and coherence;

• reward efforts of real or legal persons that contributed towards the promotion of a fruitful dialogue and harmonious interaction among various cultural traditions;

• encourage artistic expressions as a way to showcase cultural diversity and support those inspiring deeper understanding and mutual respect for a peaceful coexistence;

• respect for and encourage preserving of cultural as well as natural and historical heritage of humanity;

• promote media awareness and helps media consumers to develop a discerning and critical approach to the evaluation of information sources and media coverage to counter the misperceptions, prejudices and hate speech that entrench patterns of hostility and mistrust within and among societies;
interests: Borders and Security, Culture, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Youth
